text: (nabiyē! min) pasuvada, oba samaga tarka kaḷahot (ovunṭa) “niyata vaśayenma mā allāhṭa (allāhgē niyōgayanṭa) sampūrṇayenma avanata vunemi. (esēma) māva anugamanaya karannanda (avanata vūha)” yayi pavasā, dharmaya pahaḷa karanu læbūvanṭada (piḷirū ārādhanā karana) nūgatungenda “obat (ē andamaṭama) allāhṭa sampūrṇayenma avanata vannehuda?”yi vimasanu. (esēma) ovunda avanata vuvahot, niyata vaśayenma ovunda ṛju mārgaya at kara gatha. tavada ovun pratikṣēpa kara hæriyahot (ē venuven oba duk novanu. oba apagē dūta mehevara ovunṭa) genahæra dækvīmama oba kerehi anivāryaya vī ættēya. allāh tama vahalūnva avadhānayen yutuva balanneku vaśayen siṭinnēya
